chat_history.message:
Hello,
My Galaxy S21 5G is experiencing the following issue:
I'm not heard during calls.
I've even tried recording something on Dictaphone, and the line was straight while I was speaking and there was background noise.
At the level of the connector: my phone no longer charges through its port. I've used several chargers and cleaned the port as much as possible.
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. I have proceeded with a refund instead.

Regards,
RK
